text: Abalingani labo abakholwayo abahlala (emakhaya abo) ngaphandle kwabakhubazekile nabazabalaza endleleni kaMvelinqangi ngengcebo yabo nangemiphefumulo yabo. Futhi uMvelinqangi wakhetha abazabalaza (endleleni yakhe) ngengcebo yabo nangemiphefumulo yabo ngaphezu kwalabo abasalela ngemuva (emakhaya abo) ngezinga futhi kubona bonke uMvelinqangi wathembisa okuhle, uMvelinqangi wakhetha abazabalaza (endleleni yakhe) ngaphezu kwalabo abahleli (emakhaya abo) ngomvuzo omkhulu
